{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:51.720
    | text      = This is because you can't get a higher level degree without some form of primary degree.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:56.100

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:01.519

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = when you would graduate high school.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:10.799
    | text      = This rule is in place for a number of reasons, but it's primarily because socially, a 14
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:15.480
    | text      = or 15 year old isn't ready to be in a college setting, generally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:19.680
    | text      = And even if you're intellectually able to handle the classroom material, it can be dicey.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:24.119
    | text      = Right, we've seen the results of that too many times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:28.680
    | text      = The burnout is brutal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:30.180
    | text      = The bare minimum for this is generally 16 years old for GED issuing in states, and that's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:37.319
    | text      = the minimum age in most states that you can drop out of high school, period.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:41.640
    | text      = You can be allowed to do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:43.700
    | text      = It's generally seen as a preferred path for a student to skip a grade if they're overachieving
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:47.759

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:27.720

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Quote, my dad had met Makiya McDonald, who was then assistant to the vice president for

    | text      = Ms. McDonald.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = In 1999, Lipsman sued the New York City Board of Education because he felt that their uniform
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:23:57.119
    | text      = policy, quote, violates their rights to free speech, equal protection, privacy, and liberty
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:05.200

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:10.180
    | text      = in the case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:24.839

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:28.519
    | text      = He felt like he should be able to represent his daughter pro se, but it's established
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:32.599
    | text      = law that you can't appear pro se for someone else.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:35.240
    | text      = You can only do that if you're representing yourself, so he was in the wrong here, couldn't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:39.099
    | text      = do it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:40.099
    | text      = Yeah, that would violate that everybody's entitled to an attorney kind of thing right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:43.359
    | text      = there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:44.359
    | text      = And if you're not a lawyer and you're insisting on representing your child, then you're depriving
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:50.160
    | text      = them of...

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:51.160
    | text      = Exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:52.160
    | text      = They are entitled to a lawyer and you are not one.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:54.359

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Wow.

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:28.760
    | text      = Perfect.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:29.760
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:30.760
    | text      = So look, one of the big things that Alex wants to really nail down in terms of this interview
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:36.000

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:41.000

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:43.000
    | text      = I mean, they're not saying Rothschild's, but that's basically the vibe that I'm getting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:46.800
    | text      = from him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:47.800
    | text      = When he says old money, that's what I'm feeling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:50.239
    | text      = You might make that assumption.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:52.559
    | text      = What really runs this?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:53.920
    | text      = What does it lead back to?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:55.559
    | text      = Well, ultimately it comes down to money as almost all of these pernicious rings do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:01.820
    | text      = The producers themselves had to have customers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:05.920
    | text      = When we were able to extract information from the producers, frequently they would name
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:12.119
    | text      = more powerful people who were funding their activities and who were purchasing much of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:16.079
    | text      = the material as well as purchasing the children themselves.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:19.800

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:24.440
    | text      = again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:25.440

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = or religious influence.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:36.079
    | text      = Wow.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:37.320
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:38.800
    | text      = That's just incredible to see this going on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:43.119
    | text      = Wow.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:44.119
    | text      = This is exactly what I've made up stories about for a long time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:48.159
    | text      = And now you're telling me that all of it's true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:50.639
    | text      = This is overwhelming.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:05.079

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:12.639

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:22.039

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:25.039
    | text      = Well, it's because it feeds into the narratives that Alex already has in place, namely that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:28.360
    | text      = they're going around, they're finding these people and then they're using Interpol as
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:32.159
    | text      = a way to cover up these rich and powerful people and that then those rich and powerful
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:38.159
    | text      = people are being blackmailed in order to do exactly what the globalists want them to.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:43.800
    | text      = We then were encouraged to infiltrate the network just basically doing standard undercover
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:49.599
    | text      = work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:50.599
    | text      = We would develop a complete legend or cover story and get as much information as possible
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:55.360
    | text      = before we ultimately eliminated our targets, sometimes using torture if necessary.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:02.079
    | text      = While we were doing this, we often would uncover many names within the network that were not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:07.519
    | text      = known to us, just low-level producers again all across the world and occasionally a name
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:12.659
    | text      = would pop up that was immediately recognizable or upon further research we could see was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:17.900
    | text      = highly placed within a government, within a religious organization or some major global
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:24.639
    | text      = corporation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:25.639
    | text      = Were you allowed to go after those people?

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Not once.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:30.840
    | text      = That's amazing.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:31.840
    | text      = No way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:32.840
    | text      = Again, it was an intelligence bureau for those in the establishment that were doing this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:36.119
    | text      = to insulate themselves.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:40.519
    | text      = Just talking around the warehouse where we trained at Archangel, talking with some of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:44.880
    | text      = our supervisors, et cetera, we do know that there were occasionally times when these individuals
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:52.360
    | text      = were blackmailed with the information that we had uncovered to suit the current agenda
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:57.800
    | text      = of Interpol.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:58.800
    | text      = So this all works perfectly for Alex.

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:00.840
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = This is great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = I get it.

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:05.840

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:33.400

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:37.519
    | text      = God damn it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:38.519
    | text      = Now, just an average, you know, committing hundreds of assassinations, on average assassination,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:45.199
    | text      = how would that play out?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:46.840
    | text      = Well, each assassination team, a team of cleaners, usually was three or four individuals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:53.039
    | text      = Sometimes we were sent out singly or in teams.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:56.000
    | text      = The teams had their own strengths and weaknesses.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:59.639
    | text      = My particular forte was what's known as close wet work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:03.360
    | text      = That is close quarter combat using hands or bladed weapons.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:07.239
    | text      = You're walking up and stabbing somebody in the neck or head.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:12.079
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:13.079
    | text      = And the methods.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:14.079
    | text      = Basic special forces type stuff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:15.480
    | text      = Yes, yes, absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:17.519
    | text      = And the methods that we used were designed to eliminate the person quickly and quietly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:23.760
    | text      = There were other methods used, of course, and they were in the visual success of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:28.920
    | text      = people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:29.920
    | text      = Ever sabotaged vehicles or was that not sure enough?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:33.639
    | text      = That is definitely not sure enough.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:34.960
    | text      = Yes, this guy's a master in knives.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:37.440
    | text      = I was proficient in the size.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:40.920
    | text      = Other people in my group had...

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = He had a lot of fun.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = I'm telling you, you know what?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:54.460
    | text      = On those long road trips, he would keep us laughing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:57.400
    | text      = He was a good guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:58.400
    | text      = He was a good guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:59.400
    | text      = Sad I had to murder him!

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:01.519
    | text      = Yeah, so he's got like... they've got a team that's got proficient in knives.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:08.320
    | text      = Get the fuck out of here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:09.800
    | text      = You've got like the dirty dozen.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Fucking asshole.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:12.280
    | text      = You've got the guy who's a sharpshooter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:15.360
    | text      = You've got a knife guy, probably an explosions person.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:18.719
    | text      = Yeah, there's got to be an explosions expert.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:20.280
    | text      = Oh, wait, I've got to correct myself.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:22.980
    | text      = No car bombs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:23.980
    | text      = No, no, there's a grease man, of course, who can get into narrow situations.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:26.639
    | text      = Yeah, of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:27.639
    | text      = I get it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:28.639
    | text      = And one of the things that I think makes his story seem maybe more believable for Alex
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:33.179
    | text      = is this next clip talking about the sort of... it's not exciting to kill people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:46.039
    | text      = say, and so it lends a little bit more credibility since it's sort of off expectations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:52.400
    | text      = The dull throbbing horror of taking another person's life and of using torture techniques
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:58.880
    | text      = to extract information, of course, plays heavily on one's soul and is very difficult to deal

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = with.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:05.679
    | text      = Yeah, I'm sure it's already been so bad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:06.679
    | text      = You would ask, how did I address it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:07.679
    | text      = Frequently, these individuals, we would either catch them with child or we would catch them

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = surrounded by video or photographic images of this individual abusing children.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:20.280
    | text      = Seeing those images, it was not too difficult then to use the methods in which I was trained
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:27.679
    | text      = to extract the information.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:28.679
    | text      = Yeah, you're literally just sending a demon back to hell.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:31.320
    | text      = Yeah, so it's a dull throbbing horror as opposed to an exciting, flashy, tense situation.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:38.960
    | text      = No, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:40.519
    | text      = I mean...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:41.519
    | text      = This would be a fucked up interview no matter what, really.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:44.719
    | text      = I don't know, like, where are you at in your own brain that you can hear somebody in such
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:53.019
    | text      = a banal way just be like, I executed hundreds of people and torture with no legal justification
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:02.039
    | text      = beyond what it was we saw.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:03.960
    | text      = We have an archangel mandate.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Exactly.

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = License to kill, baby.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
